page.title: 20 NEW BUILDINGS
page.content: IN THE BLOCK AS A WHOLE THERE DO NOT SEEM TO BE MANY NEW BUILDINGS.MOST OF THE FARMHOUSES AND COTTAGES LOOK AS IF THEY HAVE BEEN THERE FOR MANY YEARS.IN STURMINSTER MARSHALL HOWEVER,THERE ARE MANY NEW HOUSES AND OTHERS ARE BEING BUILT.A FEW YEARS AGO A DEVELOPMENT PLAN WAS DRAWN UP FOR THE VILLAGE AND IT SAID THAT NEW HOUSES SHOULD BE LIMITED TO TEN A YEAR FOR THE NEXT TEN YEARS.HOWEVER,NOW THAT WE HAVE MAINS SEWAGE AND MAINS WATER IT SEEMS THAT WE ARE LIKELY TO HAVE MORE THAN A HUNDRED HOUSES IN TEN YEARS.THE LATEST DEVELOPMENT IS AT SHERIDAN WAY.A FAMILY HAS ALREADY MOVED INTO ONE OF THE HOUSES AND THE OTHERS ARE STILL BEING BUILT.PHOTOGRAPH "D" WAS TAKEN ON THIS SITE.VILLAGES NEARBY HAVE GROWN QUICKLY INTO TOWNS,PERHAPS THIS WILL HAPPEN HERE.
